record.description: Cloister that joins the Chicago Lying-In Hospital and Dispensary and the Mother's Aid Pavilion. The Chicago Lying-In Hospital and Dispensary is an affiliate of the University of Chicago Clinics which operates it. The building is part of the University Clinics group and is located at 59th Street between Ingleside and Maryland Avenues.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Stamp: Please return to the University of Chicago Office of Press Relations. Stamp: Please return to University of Chicago Public Relations Office.
